message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with cross-lingual document classification. It could also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as the paper discusses a method for classifying documents. Additionally, the use of Wikipedia-based semantic representation and language similarity metrics suggests that the paper could be relevant to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the focus on languages with small Wikipedias could make this paper relevant to cs.CY (Computers and Society).
